summary: I modified Maxi Armor of Mr. Hentai to match CBBEv3M Body figure.
descriptionHtml:
*** Maxi Armor CBBEv3M ***

		Oridinal Mod made by Hentai
					
					by MAK


	*** Apology ***
I am a Japanese, and English ability is low.
You may be hard to read my sentence.
I\'m sorry.
Still thank you for intending to read till the last!


	*** Contents of this MOD ***
I modified Maxi Armor of Mr. Hentai to match CBBEv3M Body figure.

As an additional factor, I collected the model of boots all together and functioned with that alone as Hidgh Thigh Boots.
I can combine it with Remodeled Armor which I show.
		Please watch the screenshot that I uploaded in Nexus.

	*** Required MOD ***

[ Maxi Armor by Hentai -Nexus Exclusive- by Hentai ]
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13386

[ Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- ] 	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666


	*** Installation ***

After having installed two required Mod, please overwrite in this Mod.


	*** Credits ***

 Mr.Hentai
	Many splendid equipment surprises us. Thank you!

 Mr.Caliente
	Women of SKYRIM became beautiful thanks to your figure. I thank you again!


	*** Video ***
mrkrossfaith made it for me. Thank you!
 [youtube]EQ9_7MMQJuk[/youtube]


	*** Afterword ***
While Mr. Hentai admits remodeling and distribution of original MOD, it is free you remodel this MOD, and to distribute.



--- Answer to common question ---
Q. What does hairstyle MOD use?

A. Hairstyle MOD is
[ Tera Hair Weight Fix version ]
Because it is not a file uploaded in Nexus, please search it.


Q. What does face MOD use?

A. Face MOD is
[ RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46 ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127

[ RANs Eyeliner Replacer by RAN46 ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701

[ envision Face by DD AKT ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897
author: MAK
